name: Hopmax Technology
overview:
Hopmax Technology, the dedicated RFID technology devices manufacturer

Hopmax Technology Co.,Ltd is a high-tech RFID technology enterprise specialized in producing the first-class RFID scanners, RFID tags, RFID reader antennas, who owns professional R & D, produce and market team on RFID technology.

Organizations use Hopmax’s RFID UHF frequency products-uhf rfid scanners, uhf tag, rfid reader antenna, portable rfid reader and services to improve the effectiveness, efficiency and security f their supply chains, logistics and asset tracking operations.

Most Hopmax’s RFID devices are used widely in vehicle managemnet, car parking systems, warehouse management, healthcare systems, retails systems, logistics systems, asset control, etc.

Hopmax was founded in 2007 as a RFID hardware manufacturer in China, also customize RFID devices for our clients. Welcome to contact us for details!

offices.address1: F5, Building B, Bonded Industry Park, Fu tian District,
